update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
nickName = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
openId = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
